title: Week 1 - May 1, 2022
description:
Receive 100% extra EXP from Runes.
Receive 300% extra EXP from Combo Kill Orbs.
Receive 2 stars when you successfully do Star Force 10 enhancements and lower.
Receive 2x Blooming Coins from Blossoming Forest events. Note: Does not apply to Legion Gardening.
The limit of Blooming Coins you can obtain from Blossoming Forest events is doubled. Note: Does not apply to Legion Gardening.

title: Week 2 - May 8, 2022
description:
Receive 2x EXP from Pollo and Fritto Bounty Hunting.
Receive 2x EXP from participating in the Inferno Wolf hunt.
Receive 50% extra EXP from Monster Park clears.
Receive 2x Blooming Coins from Blossoming Forest events. Note: Does not apply to Legion Gardening.
The limit of Blooming Coins you can obtain from Blossoming Forest events is doubled. Note: Does not apply to Legion Gardening.

title: Week 3 - May 15, 2022
description:
Receive 50% off Spell Trace enhancements. (Aurora, Bera, Elysium, Luna, and Scania worlds only.)
Receive 50% off Ability resets.
Receive 2x Blooming Coins from Blossoming Forest events. Note: Does not apply to Legion Gardening.
The limit of Blooming Coins you can obtain from Blossoming Forest events is doubled. Note: Does not apply to Legion Gardening.

title: Week 4 - May 22, 2022
description:
Receive 100% success rate when you do Star Force 5, 10, and 15 enhancements. (Superior equipment excluded.)
Receive 2x Blooming Coins from Blossoming Forest events. Note: Does not apply to Legion Gardening.
The limit of Blooming Coins you can obtain from Blossoming Forest events is doubled. Note: Does not apply to Legion Gardening.
